segments.text: Hello ? Is this the Maintenance Department ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . That ’ s right . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ re having a lot of trouble with our printer . Could you come and take a look at it sometime this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Yeah , all right . I ’ ll be over about two .
segments.speaker: S2
